title: Japan Lifts Covid-19 Ban on Business Travelers, Foreign Workers
sub_head: As neighbor China sticks to zero-Covid policy, Japan aligns itself closer with U.S., Europe
body:
TOKYOâ€”Japan said it would allow short-term business travelers and foreign laborers to enter the country, responding to calls from companies that said they feared falling behind the West.
The decision followed a sharp fall in new infections in Japan, which is reporting only a few hundred new Covid-19 cases a day. More than 70% of the population is fully vaccinated.
